group_1.textLeft: We tied them up, but it doesn't seem like@they'll talk.

group_1.textRight: What should we do? We can't actually do@anything mean to them.

group_1.textLeft: Isn't that your phone, Madoka?

group_1.textRight: Maybe something happened in Kamihama.@You should check the message.

group_1.narration: "I found out something about Mami,@so I thought I'd let you know."

group_1.textRight: Then this...!

group_1.textLeft: Keep reading, Madoka!

group_1.textCenter: Uh, o-okay! Give me a sec!

group_1.narration: Mami might've been turned into an Uwasa.

group_1.textLeft: Mami turned into an Uwasa?

group_1.textRight: That can't be...
But she also wrote how we can save her.
"You can remove the Uwasa if you can get@through to her heart," she says.

group_1.textLeft: If we can get through...
To her heart...

group_1.textRight: What's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: Do you think we know Mami well enough?

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: It's true... It's not easy to put one's true@feelings into words...

group_1.textRight: To me, Mami is strong, kind, and a reliable@person.
She's a veteran Magical Girl, and I really @look up to her.
But...
I've never seen her struggle with anything.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
She might seem like it, but I doubt Mami's@always so strong and fearless...
Nobody can be like that all the time.

group_1.textRight: If she has any weaknesses, I for one want@to accept them...
We relied on her so many times in the past.@I want her to be able to rely on us too.

group_1.textLeft: Madoka...

group_1.textRight: Then we'll find a way to not become@Witches, together.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! I want to accept her as she is too.

group_1.textRight: But to do that...

group_1.textLeft: Yes. First, we need answers...
From the Wings of the Magius!
Huh?

group_1.textRight: No way...

group_1.textCenter: I won't allow anyone to bring harm to my@friends.

group_1.textLeft: Mami!

group_1.textRight: I was the one who brought the Witches to@Mitakihara.

group_1.textLeft: No... Why would you do that?

group_1.textRight: I am responsible.
I am the one responsible for getting you@caught up in the world of Magical Girls.
...That's why I can't allow you girls to get@involved any more than you already are.

group_1.textLeft: That's no reason to release Witches in@Mitakihara!
You're out of your mind, Mami!

group_1.textRight: You girls stay put here.
If you do, then the Magius will be your@salvation...
I don't want any of you to feel despair.

group_1.textLeft: Mami...

group_1.textRight: Please. You understand what I'm asking you,@don't you?

group_1.textLeft: No, I don't. I don't understand at all!
Are you okay with the people of Mitakihara@suffering at the hands of your Witches?

group_1.textRight: No, I'm not.

group_1.textLeft: But that's what the Wings of the Magius@is doing!

group_1.textRight: This is necessary. It needs to be done, if@you want to be saved.

group_1.textLeft: But...fighting in Mitakihara poses the risk@of becoming a Witch.
Did you bring them here, knowing full@well that could happen?
Don't you care if we turn into Witches?!

group_1.textRight: ...Of course I care.
Nobody should become a Witch.

group_1.textLeft: Then you should understand that the Magiusâ€”

group_1.textRight: Yes, the Magius are our only salvation.

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: Don't you see it now?
The Magius created a city where Magical@Girls don't transform into Witches.
THAT is salvation!

group_1.textLeft: You're wrong... That can't be right!
They're making you do awful things. There's@no way they're our salvation!
Please stop this!
We accept you for who you are!
Please, come back to us, Mami!

group_1.textRight: What's this, now? I came to get Mami.
But this situation is absolutely perfetto!

group_1.textLeft: Y-you're...!

group_1.textRight: Ahaha, how is your reunion going so far?
Are you sad? Afraid? Angry?
It's so emotional! My heart can barely take@it.

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what are you talking about?

group_1.textRight: Ahaha!
I appreciate the entertainment.
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:1008A02]But you're still interfering with our work!

group_1.narration: "A Labyrinth?! No! We can't escape it!"
"Stop it! Don't interfere with us!@Give Mami back to us!"
"Stop making Mami do such horrible things!"

group_1.textRight: Ahahaha!
It's time for you to wait out your finale,@inside the Labyrinth.
Mami, I leave the last bit to you.

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2]Of course.
I've secured the Labyrinth with my ribbon.@Nobody will be getting out.

group_1.textRight: Magnifico!
Now those meddlers can just sit back and@watch what unfolds!
